justification: “We calculated d´ … simply representing the observed 2AFC accuracy,” indicating that d′ is the metric used to quantify Type-1 accuracy.
“The Type-2 AUC … is often used as a nonparametric measure of metacognitive sensitivity,” directly linking the construct to the measure.
“…one can estimate the d´ value … which is the SDT-grounded metacognitive sensitivity measure, meta-d´,” identifying meta-d′ as a measure of metacognitive sensitivity.
“The ratio of these measures, meta-d´/d´ is defined as metacognitive efficiency,” specifying the ratio as the instrument for that construct.
“Observers' metacognitive behavior can be summarized in the Type-2 ROC,” showing the ROC curve is used to assess overall metacognitive behavior.
